media:group.media:title: VITA MEANS LIFE :: The Book
media:group.media:description:
This video is a collaboration between Sandeep @2 old 4 gaming and me.
I discuss his fourth and final book on the PS Vita - in detail!
Time stamps provided below!

IMPORTANT LINKS
=========================

The Kickstarter with lots of background info:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/52911390/vita-means-life

Sandeep's website:
https://www.2old4gaming.com/
and Store:
https://www.2old4gaming.com/store
I suggest signing up for his mailing list for news/updates!

PlayStation Lifestyle article:
https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2021/11/26/ps-vita-book-kickstarter/

GamesRadar article
https://www.gamesradar.com/uk/why-one-vita-enthusiast-is-writing-a-fourth-book-about-the-handheld/
